1.0.0.name: wordpress/easy-webtrends
1.0.0.description:
Track your site with Webtrends

Easy Webtrends makes using Webtrends with Wordpress easy and straightforward. Once Easy Webtrends has been enabled, you can quickly load your tracking scripts through the Wordpress dashboard (Click Settings -> Easy Webtrends) and start monitoring your visitors and their behaviour through your Webtrends dashboard.

Compatible with Webtrends v9 & 10

Easy Webtrends is compatible with both Webtrends v9 and v10. Simply generate your tracking code using the Webtrends tag builder and paste the generated script into the Easy Webtrends interface. The plugin will load the correct javascript file and you'll be ready to go in seconds.

Quickly tag your entire site

Through the Easy Webtrends options panel, you can quickly tag your entire site. Easy Webtrends will load these tags on each and every page. Its also just as easy to setup cust
